refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o STKclarinet.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
ifrq = p4 kv5 = p5 ;breath pressure kv1 line p6, p3, p7 ;reed stiffness asig STKClarinet cpspch(p4), 1, 2, kv1, 4, 100, 11, 60, 1, 10, 128, kv5 outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 3 8.00 100 127 10 i 1 + 10 8.08 80 60 100 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
